Title: Brugato
Actors: Aj Rascon, Camille Amend, Lyndsay Irwin, Terry Groves
Plot: A 1932 corruption riddled man dreams of living a great life in the future. He must soon foil a large drug scandal in 2014 through a wild time switch, but lets a girl get in his way, and must decide which type of life he'd like to live.
